title: Unspecified error occured please check logs
body: So i uninstalled league and re installed it but when i get to about 38-43 it tell me the error idk what to do ive reinstalled it about 6 times now and it says the same thing at 38-43 every time now PLEASE help me i want to play league

replies.body:
It sounds like your patcher is dropping its connection to the patching servers, thus causing this error. I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings don't conflict with League.

Let me know if those steps cause any change.
